name: Like a Fashionista
storyline: Like a Fashionista, a virtual fashion and decorating game that is a caricature of real life. Decorate your home, find a boyfriend and a job to become the most popular Fashionista!
summary: A virtual fashion and decorating game where you can take care of your own Fashionista and help her evolve. It's up to you to find her the man of her dreams, dress her and feed her to make her the most popular Fashionista!

videos.name: Accolades Trailer
videos.title: Présentation du 1er jeu virtuel de mode Ma Bimbo
